reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Quite frankly, I was looking for a firmer toothbrush that was better for the environment, but also very functional it with removing plaque, and I can say that I am not disappointed with this product. It’s definitely firm and very modern. I love the design in the color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best toothbrush I've ever purchased
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this brush for several months and one thing I can say is that anyone who says these brushes are not hard must have used stainless steel brushes to brush their teeth... lol. They are HARD for sure. Maybe they received the wrong softness or firmness, but I can say the ones I received are hard. My dentist could not find a problem with my gums because they clean so well. And it has been several months since owning these and they are still as firm as new. The box of 6 that I purchased will last more than a year based on how well they are holding up. The reach is great also as I am able to get well into the teeth in the back of my mouth. I'm very satisfied with these and the price was great also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great hard bristles if your gums and teeth are healthy
reviews.reviewText: If this brush is too harsh for you, you might want to consider visiting the dentist or upping your oral hygiene regimen. It's kind of like a new nylon scrub towel when it first comes out of the package - kinda rough but oh so invigorating, and in short time, leaves you with an ultra clean scrubbed feeling. My gums are in the best health they've been in in a long time, light pink and strong. No aches or sensitivity after sweets and extreme temperatures. Using this brush has improved my overall oral health, and I'm absolutely thrilled.The brush is also very attractive if you've got a natural scheme going on in your bathroom. I've used my brush for over 2 months now and only lost 1 bristle in the first week, still holding up extremely well. Highly recommend, and wish I needed to buy more cuz I'd hate to see for this product to go away. With care, you can make these brushes last a good while. Enjoy them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple design that works well
reviews.reviewText: I bought these because I like to pack as light as possible when traveling and they're a great substitute for my bulkier electric toothbrush and its charging hub. They also work well for cleaning my retainer. I have also dedicated a few of them as a dry cleaning and dusting tool for those hard to reach corners. It is also a plus for me that they are made of bamboo and not plastic. Bristles are soft--not hard like advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product for preventing build-up
reviews.reviewText: The bristles are a bit stiff but very tolerable. In my opinion, this is better than the soft bristles recommended by dentists. Imagine how dental hygienists “scrape” the teeth! Hard bristles are not likely to do damage and do a better cleaning, hence less need for dental hygienist visits. Provided of course people can tolerate it on the gums. However, with use, the tolerance should improve. Do dentists have another motive for suggesting soft brushes…..?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars they are too soft
reviews.reviewText: too soft, does not feel that they brush too much your teeth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my boyfriend because he like the harder bristle toothbrush and all I can ever find in stores are medium ones so these were a great find.Inexpensive, very strong and sturdy, he loves them. A very good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love it,it’s better than famous brands
